public KMLPolygonImpl(KMLTraversalContext tc,
                      KMLPlacemark placemark,
                      KMLAbstractGeometry geom)
Create an instance.

Parameters:
tc - the current KMLTraversalContext.
placemark - the Placemark element containing the LineString.
geom - the KMLPolygon geometry.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the geometry is null.
IllegalArgumentException - if the parent placemark or the traversal context is null.
